description: A convolution triangle of numbers obtained from A025750.
links: W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
formula: a(n, m) = 5*(5*(n-1)-m)*a(n-1, m)/n + m*a(n-1, m-1)/n, n >= m >= 1; a(n, m) := 0, n<m; a(n, 0) := 0; a(1, 1)=1.T(n,m):=(m*sum(k=0..n-m, (-1)^(n-m-3*k)*binomial(n+k-1,n-1)*sum(j=0..k, 2^j*binomial(k,j)*sum(i=j..n-m-k+j, binomial(j,i-j)*binomial(k-j,n-m-3*(k-j)-i)*5^(3*(k-j)+i)))))/n. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Dec 10 2011]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
